mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (item_code, item_name, location, stock, safety_stock, shortage_amount, price, factory_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{location}, #{stock}, #{safetyStock}, #{shortageAmount}, #{price}, #{factoryId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item WHERE item_code = #{itemCode} LIMIT 1
